mutants.code:
def can_distribute_beans(r: int, b: int, d: int) -> bool:
    group_cnt = min(r, b)
    delta = abs(r - b)
    if not d:
        return not delta
    needed_groups = (delta + d - 1) / d
    return needed_groups <= group_cnt

def can_distribute_beans(r: int, b: int, d: int) -> bool:
    group_cnt = min(r, b)
    delta = abs(r - b)
    if not d:
        return not delta
    needed_groups = (delta + d - 1) * d
    return needed_groups <= group_cnt
